Get the RGB hexadecimal representation of a Qt color :param color: color to convert to hexadecimal :return: str: hexadecimal RGB color string (‘#RRGGBB’)

classmethod as_rgb(color: QColor) → tuple[int, int, int]

Get the RGB values of a Qt color :param color: color to convert to RGB :return: tuple[int, int, int]: (r, g, b) values with range 0-255
